You should have lots of time to plan your buying if you are in the market.There are programs going on in other countries around the world.We will also have some exclusive discounts in the coming weeks on Canon gear for Premium Members in the USA. html:
‘Tis the season of official Canon rebates around the world. A lot of these discounts programs will likely be going until the end of January in one form or another. There will be programs that expire and new programs will arise. You should have lots of time to plan your buying if you are in the market.

There are programs going on in other countries around the world.

We will also have some exclusive discounts in the coming weeks on Canon gear for Premium Members in the USA. We're working on the same for the UK and Europe. These discounts will go above and beyond the official rebate discounts.

Canon USA

Canon currently has rebates on most of its lineup of EOS R cameras and RF mount lenses. The largest rebate is $700 on the EOS R5 RF 24-105 f/4L IS USM Kit.

Check out all of the Canon Rebates at B&H Photo

Canon UK

Canon UK has a lot of big dollar deals, including £780 off the Canon EOS R6 Mark II body along with £650 off the Canon EOS R5 body. There are also good savings on Canon's most popular L and non-L lenses.

Check out all of of the Canon Rebates at Wex Photo

Canon Europe

Canon Europe is doing cashback sales on a lot of Canon gear for both Black Friday/Cyber Monday along with a Winter Cashback Program. There are discounts at up to €400.

Check out all of the Canon Deals at Foto Koch

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
